module.name: skrill
module.description: Secure online payments for your business. Take advantage of a modern, flexible, and optimized payment solution- all with one contract, one integration and free setup
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Secure online payments for your business. Take advantage of a modern, flexible, and optimized payment solution- all with one contract, one integration and free setup.
module.additional_description: Free and quick setupAccess credit cards, 20+ local payment methods and support for over 80 banksTake advantage of the Skrill multi-currency account, giving you access to 40+ currenciesHigh-security standards and anti-fraud technologySeamless payment experience across mobile, tablet and desktopConnect with millions of Skrill account holders

module.name: paypal
module.description: This free official PayPal module can help you grow your sales by adding PayPal and PayPal Pay Later options to your store
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: This free official PayPal module can help you grow your sales by adding PayPal and PayPal Pay Later options to your store. With millions of users in over 200 markets, PayPal is one of the most trusted and familiar brands in the world.
module.additional_description: Activate easilyWith PayPal, you can start accepting payments quickly without any set-up fee. Include Pay Later options at no extra cost to your businessPay Later lets customers pay over time while you get paid upfront. [1] PayPal's pay later options are helping boost merchant conversion rates and cart sizes by 39% [2] Promote Pay Later on your siteLet customers know they have the flexibility to buy now and pay later by adding Pay Later promotional messaging and Pay Later button to your site. Offer fast checkout with less frictionStreamlined checkout helps reduce cart abandonment, drive conversion rates, and encourage repeat business. With PayPal, customers can use their saved billing and shipping info to check out faster — on any device. Get best-in-class fraud detectionPayPal helps you handle the risk of fraudulent transactions with our fraud, chargeback, and Seller Protection [3] capabilities (on eligible transactions). Our AI technology works hard to monitor your transactions – so you can focus on what matters most. Access funds quickly. After a customer completes their PayPal transaction, you’re quickly credited while the payment is processing. Funds settle directly into your PayPal business account. PayPal is one of the world’s most trusted, and familiar brands [4]Millions of global users20+ years of experience200+ markets around the world100+ different currencies  [1] PayPal Pay Later eligibility and availability is subject to merchant status, sector and integration. Consumer eligibility is subject to status and approval. Product features differ by market. See relevant product terms for more details.https://www.paypal.com/uk/webapps/mpp/paypal-payin3/terms[2] PayPal Q2 earnings 2021.[3] Available on eligible purchases. Limits apply. https://www.paypal.com/us/webapps/mpp/ua/useragreement-full[4] Morning Consult - The 15 Most Trusted Brands Globally. March 2021.

module.name: boxtalconnect
module.description: Official module for Boxtal, shipping solution with no subscription or commitment. Synchronize your orders with Boxtal and ship them with the best carriers on the market
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Official module for Boxtal, shipping solution with no subscription or commitment. Synchronize your orders with Boxtal and ship them with the best carriers on the market. Display a parcel point map during checkout.
module.additional_description: Save 2 hours a day Your orders are synchronized with your Boxtal account, where you can automate shipping rules to generate your shipping labels. Ship with all types of carriers (express, relay, home, letters, parcels, pallets, France, international, ...), with or without insurance, options, ... A single invoice for all your shipments and a single customer service to manage all delivery issues. Tech support that responds, not useless chatbots.

module.name: autoupgrade
module.description: The Update Assistant module helps you backup, update and restore your PrestaShop store. With just a few clicks, you can move to the latest version of PrestaShop with confidence
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: The Update Assistant module helps you backup, update and restore your PrestaShop store. With just a few clicks, you can move to the latest version of PrestaShop with confidence.
module.additional_description: The Update Assistant module enables you to:Update your store: enjoy the latest features and improvements to the user experience introduced by new versions of PrestaShop.Backup your store: make backups before updating to protect your store in case of technical failure, cyber-attack or human error.Restore your store: easily restore your store to a previous state in case of a problems during or after the update, ensuring business continuity. Advantages of the module:Saves you time updating, backing up and restoring.Guides you through the key steps of these processes.Secures your store with preventive backups before updating.Minimises risk with automatic compatibility checks.Keeps your store compliant with officially supported versions.Saves you money by simplifying updates.The Update Assistant module is an essential tool for users who want to keep their PrestaShop store up to date easily and efficiently.

module.name: payplug
module.displayName: - Payplug | Accept customer payments, wherever they are
module.description: Cash all customer credit card payments with a single payment solution: on your PrestaShop e-commerce site, in-store, or directly from online customer conversations
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Cash all customer credit card payments with a single payment solution: on your PrestaShop e-commerce site, in-store, or directly from online customer conversations.
module.additional_description: One payment system for all your sales channels Payplug allows credit card payments:via your online store (PrestaShop) in just a few clicks;in-store, with payment terminals that meet the highest market standards;through payment links from customer conversations via text, e-mail, messenger, or WhatsApp.Then you can manage all payments from one tool, your Payplug portal. Manage your performance directly from the Payplug portalView all payments in real time;Understand why credit card payments failed;Download integrated accounting reports in one simple click;Generate payment links to be shared via online customer conversations;Carry out bank transfer requests and receive them within 24 hours! Establish your own PrestaShop module to receive online paymentsInstall the Payplug payment module in just a few clicks. Choose the display type for your payment page (redirected, pop-up), and customize the background of your payment page (including colors). Our online payment module is fully secure and compatible with PSD2 - no extra handling is required from you. Handle Payplug directly from your PrestaShop backoffice: for example, you can organize customer refunds. Increase your turnover with PayLaterOffer your customers the option to pay in 3 or 4 installments with or without fees and receive full payment for the order immediately. Fraud and non-payment are 100% covered by our partner Oney.Merchants offering this Payplug feature to their customers have seen their average shopping cart value increase by 45% on average.New: with Payplug, choose the minimum and maximum shopping cart amounts between which the 3x or 4x payment option is made available to your customers. One more step towards optimising your margin! French-speaking supportOnce your payment module is set up, contact our Paris-based support teams with your questions about your online PrestaShop payments.

module.name: jmarketplace
module.description: Create your own marketplace allowing your customers register as sellers for sell their products in exchange for a commission
module.author: JA Modules
module.description_full: Create your own marketplace allowing your customers register as sellers for sell their products in exchange for a commission.
module.additional_description: We are quality leaders and PrestaShop experts with more than 15 years of experience in the sector and we can guarantee that this product can help you a lot to get the goal you want. We know and like what we do, that's why we offer you the best of us, in a very complete product and at the best price. Our module, your trust marketplace. This module is synonymous with analysis, constant work and innovation. We always listen to your suggestions and requests to improve it and make a more competent, complete product with a good technical support team that is attentive to solve all doubts and problems, always giving the best possible result. Benefits for administrator Expansion catalog with products from other sellers.More sales possibilities.More offer for customers.Compatible with any payment method.All customer purchases are received by the market. When appropriate, vendor commissions can be paid.Very complete management of sellers, products, commissions, etc.Very complete control panel or dashboard where you will be able to see all the market advances.Fixed commission per sale.Variable commission by seller, category or levels (Bronze, Silver and Gold).Super complete configuration per page or functionality. You will not have to modify the code to enable or disable functions on the front.Communication system between client, seller and administrator through the platform.Compatible with most of the available themes. It is ideal to choose a theme that it has been developed with Bootstrap 3 technology or higher. Benefits for the seller Easy and intuitive product management.Export and import products en masse.Management of the seller profile.Commission history.Order history and management.Creates your own carriers and shipping rates.Selection of the preferred payment method to collect your commissions.Graph of commissions received.Request for withdrawal of funds.Centralized marketplace message box.

module.additional_description: bpost Shipping Manager is a solution that allows to easily integrate delivery functionalities in your webshop.Not only are the different delivery methods (to home or office location, to a parcel locker or a postal point) immediately available in your shop, you can also manage most of the settings directly via the Prestashop backend, print the labels and access the Track & Trace. The add-on is free of charge, still a contract with bpost should be signed in order to have access to the bpost logistical solutions. What this module does for you-      Easy set-up, plug & play-      Responsive design-      All bpost delivery methods are immediately available:@home (national & international)@pickup point (national & international)@Parcels locker International-      Configure prices per delivery method, independently and directly in the module-      Use most common options for your sendings (signature, basic insurance, automatic second presentation)-      Print directly from the backend-      Track & Trace your parcels from the backend

module.additional_description: Easily integrate your PrestaShop with major online marketplaces like Amazon, eBay, and others through magnalister, and take advantage of essential features including product uploads, order imports, price and inventory synchronization, order status reconciliation, invoice creation and distribution, along with numerous automation capabilities. As of April 2024, we support a diverse array of platforms: Amazon, eBay, Cdiscount, Rakuten FR, Etsy, OTTO, METRO, Kaufland.de, Ricardo, hood.de, plus price comparison sites such as Check24 and idealo. We're constantly expanding our network, adding more high-traffic national and international marketplaces, and regularly enhancing the functionality of the magnalister PrestaShop Addon to meet your evolving needs. Discover the full potential of magnalister with a 30-day free trial, and explore the complete suite of features without any cost!

module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Sell products from your catalog, by including them in packs composing "step by step". This module will allow you to create product packs to compose your customers among selections in your catalog.
module.additional_description: Increase sales of targeted products in your catalog. Increase the value of the basket of your visitors by influencing on sets of products. Guide your customers in the selection of your products. With this module you create as many steps as you want, each with an arbitrary selection of products. For each step you set a minimum rule adding to cart. Once validated rule, your customer can go to the next step. Once all the steps validated, your customer can finalize the order and receive the discount you have set in your pack! New: fix a price for your pack, the system automatically created a product pack and synchronize your stocks.

module.name: amazonpay
module.description: Amazon Pay offers a trusted, secure, and convenient payment method that allows your customers to use their existing Amazon account to make purchases on your PrestaShop store
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Amazon Pay offers a trusted, secure, and convenient payment method that allows your customers to use their existing Amazon account to make purchases on your PrestaShop store. By integrating Amazon Pay, you can provide your customers with a familiar and streamlined checkout experience that leverages Amazon's technology, learnings, and industry-leading best practises. To get started, merchants first need to register for an Amazon Pay account. Once registered, you can easily integrate the Amazon Pay addon with your PrestaShop online store.
module.additional_description: By offering Amazon Pay, you can:Reduce checkout friction: Shoppers complete purchases in as few as three clicks, with Amazon recognising active logins to avoid re-entering billing, shipping, and payment information. This frictionless checkout experience can help reduce cart abandonment and increase conversion rates by 35%1.Enhance Brand Trust:  The Amazon brand is a proven winner of customer trust. Customers feel confident and secure when they see the Amazon brand at your store's checkout, leading to higher sales3.Benefit from Advanced Fraud Protection:  Amazon's industry-leading fraud detection and security measures help reduce decline handling and fraud risk, giving your customers peace of mind and your business financial protection.Reach International Shoppers: Multi-currency support for Amazon Pay makes it easier for international customers to complete purchases on your PrestaShop store, reducing friction in the checkout process and helping you expand your global reach. [1]: Comscore custom study for Amazon Pay comparing conversion rates between Amazon Pay and native merchant checkouts in the U.S. over a 5-month period from October 2021 – March 2022, n=40. [2]: For two years in a row, The Values Institute ranked Amazon as the top most trusted brand in retail in 2018. Also, in brand rankings from BrandZ by Kantar MillwardBrown and Best Global Brand 2019 by Interbrand, Amazon is rated as the top most valuable brand. [3]:  Consumer Net Promoter Score (NPS) Surveys: Conducted by Amazon Pay in 2019 among US, UK, DE, FR, IT, and ES consumers who had used Amazon Pay in the 12 months preceding to the survey launch dates

module.name: becommerce
module.description: BeCommerce is the Belgian Non-Profit that contributes to the strengthening of consumer confidence in e-commerce by a formal labeling process of e-commerce sites
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: BeCommerce is the Belgian Non-Profit that contributes to the strengthening of consumer confidence in e-commerce by a formal labeling process of e-commerce sites. Thanks to its trustmark, BeCommerce contributes to the growth of the sector.
module.additional_description: 1. Confidence and the BeCommerce TrustmarkConsumer trust is crucial and our Trustmark contributes to the increasement of the trust level in e-commerce. In order to use our Trustmark, the webshop has to go through a certification process performed by an independent audit office, Bureau Veritas. Bureau Veritas checks your webshop on about 40 points. Once the certification has been successfully completed, it can carry both the BeCommerce and the Ecommerce Europe Trustmarks. We have also negotiated an advantageous price for our members for a rating and review system for your consumers. In addition, BeCommerce also provides twice a year a free penetration test of the webshop urls, so you remain protected against hacking and phishing. Both the BeCommerce and the Ecommerce Europe Trustmarks generate extra trust and can yield more conversions and therefore extra revenues. 2. Research and DataWe provide our members regularly with relevant facts and figures. The BeCommerce Market Monitor gives some insights in consumer spendings on e-commerce in Belgium.  This study of about 70 pages clearly shows the trends and evolutions in Belgian e-commerce, and this on a quarterly basis. You can see who is buying online, how are they buying online, the different analyses by sector, the different payment methods, etc. In addition to the BeCommerce Market Monitor, BeCommerce also publishes the BeCommerce Shopping100, which is a top 100 of the webshops where Belgian consumers most often shop online, including a top 25 cross-border webshops. 3. Networking EventsEvery year we organize several recurring events on topics such as Logistics, Mobile and Cross-Border.  Various companies share their business cases, CEO’s debate some hot topics, and the attendees can discuss this during the network moments in between. The BeCommerce Awards are our yearly competition where various outstanding webshops can obtain prestigious prizes: it gathers the most important e-commerce players in the Belgian market. 4. Dispute ResolutionWe provide an independent ADR-mechanism for e-commerce consumers in Belgium, whereby we refer complaints to the webshop in question or to the ombudsman competent in the issue concerned. 5. Regulatory and Governmental AffairsWe offer our members legal support and keep them up-to-date on new developments in e-commerce.  Together with Ecommerce Europe, we defend the interests of e-commerce at both the European, national and regional levels. Ecommerce Europe is constantly monitoring the European Commission and can always influence new proposals that could affect e-commerce.

module.name: crisp
module.description: Crisp is the all-in-one platform for customer support dedicated to Prestashop merchants
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Crisp is the all-in-one platform for customer support dedicated to Prestashop merchants. The platform comes with a live chat widget, an AI Chatbot and many other features that deeply integrates with your Prestashop online store.
module.additional_description: Transform your customer service into a new acquisition's channel Crisp is a multichannel customer experience platform that helps online store to centralize inbound messages to land into one inbox, allowing merchants to avoid switching back and forth between Facebook, Instagram, Email Inbox or WhatsApp and phone calls. Through a powerful data synchronization between Prestashop and Crisp, merchants can create personnalized and unique support experience. No matter customer's state, retailers will aways stay ahead. The platform offers ready-to-use tools that will make online merchants ready and powerful today, not in a month: Sales and FAQ chatbot templates, empowered by AI and trained on product data are designed to increase revenue and answer repetitive customer's questions. Through a flat-rate pricing, merchants using Crisp for Prestashop can preserve their margins while scaling their customer support process. All-in-all, Crisp for Prestashop doesn't only provide a live chat, an AI Chatbot or a shared inbox: It's full suite of tools dedicated at making online merchants more efficient in their daily customers' relationship tasks. How does Crisp stands out from the crowd?- 55% resolution rate powered by Crisp AI Chatbot- 100% no-code solution to empower teams from any sector- Lightweight chat widget made not to slowdown website loading speed- Free mobile and desktop iOs & Android app- Flat-rate pricing on all our plans- In-house AI models for better privacy-driven companies Simple things you can do to scale your customer support in less than 5 minutes- Decrease bounce rate and CPC with proactive and personnalized chat messages- Improve average number of conversations per agent by creating templated message that leverage dynamic data shared through Prestashop data- Connect channels such as emails, Instagram DMs or Messenger to your Crisp inbox- Build bots to automate repetitive questions on any channels thanks to ready-to-use chatbot templates- Train AI models on custom data such as website data, product data or conversational data. Numbers behind Crisp- 500 000 customers around the world- 50+ languages available- 210 000 000 users each month- 24/5 customer support available in 5 different languages

What used to take hundreds of engineering hours can be done by businesses in as little as an afternoon.

Businesses using the Stripe checkout saw 11.9% more revenue on average. Stripe can help customers:Increase conversion.Expand your customer base.Lower costs.Reduce time and effort. Increase conversion Stripe uses algorithms trained on billions of data points to display and order payment methods you’ve enabled to maximize conversion for each customer on each page. Expand your customer base Convert customers who might otherwise abandon their cart with buy now, pay later options like Klarna and Clearpay and local payment methods like Cartes Bancaires, BACS direct debit, Blik, Bizum, and bank transfers.   Lower costs Reduce transaction costs with lower-cost payment methods. Save money and fight fraud with Stripe Radar, which works seamlessly with the Stripe platform.  Reduce time and effort Launch payment methods in minutes, not days, and simplify operations and management with unified monitoring, reporting, and payouts. Future-proof your business by configuring new payment methods as soon as they are supported.

module.name: trustpilot

module.author: PrestaShop Partners

module.additional_description: Trustpilot is an open-to-all reviews platform where consumers are heard by businesses, and where businesses can earn consumer trust. Grow your business with genuine content that comes directly from the people who matter most—your customers. Trustpilot for PrestaShop Trustpilot’s integration for PrestaShop lets merchants trigger service and product review invitations to customers automatically. Use the TrustBox tool to drag-and-drop reviews and ratings widgets on your site at key conversion points. Read on for what more you can do with a Trustpilot account. Grow a trusted brand Invite your customers to share feedback at the ideal moment. Authentic content generated from your customers helps drive your SEO ranking and increases traffic to your site.Collect reviews on your Trustpilot profile pages, which frequently appear on the first page of search engines.Grow on Google with verified reviews that count toward Google Seller Ratings. Product reviews enhance and qualify your product pages for review snippets in organic search. Increase purchasing conversion and grow revenue Turn real reviews from real customers into real conversion drivers. Showcase reviews across your website when consumers are actively looking to make a purchase decision.Get consumers talking by sharing your reviews anywhere you engage with consumers—paid ads, email, social, and out-of-home. Give potential customers the confidence they need throughout their journey.Showcase reviews in ad creative without design skills with our Image Generator. Increase customer retention and maximize LTV Learn from customers to optimize and improve your service and products. Identify trends in customer sentiment across product inventory, customer service, shipping, price, and more.Respond to reviews and prove you take customer feedback seriously to turn first time buyers into repeat customers and your best advocates.Keep customers coming back with an ever-improving product selection. Product Attributes ratings help you understand your products from your customer’s point-of-view. Get started with a free accountWhether you’re just getting started or you’re already an expert at engaging and building trust with your customers, we can help. A free account gives businesses the tools needed to start collecting, managing, and showcasing reviews. Sign up for a Standard Plan to upgrade your profile page, invite more customer reviews, access the Customer Success team, learn from detailed review analysis, use more TrustBox widgets onsite, produce marketing assets, and get the option to upgrade with Add-on Modules. Read more about our Plans and Add-on Modules: business.trustpilot.com/plans

module.name: connectif

module.author: PrestaShop Partners

module.additional_description: Seamless PrestaShop Integration Connectif is designed to work hand-in-hand with PrestaShop, offering quick and easy integration and enhancing your eCommerce operations and results from day one. Whether it’s synchronizing customer data, tracking behavior, or automating campaigns, Connectif empowers PrestaShop merchants to achieve more than with other automation platforms, without the technical hurdles. Real-Time Customer Insights including Anonymous Traffic Track and analyze every customer interaction in real time, from product visits to purchases, even for anonymous users. With instant visibility into their journey, PrestaShop merchants can deliver personalized, relevant communication that keeps customers engaged and encourages conversions. Boost Retention and Repeat Purchases PrestaShop merchants can easily create tailored campaigns to re-engage each and every customer. Use predictive metrics like Customer Lifetime Value (CLV) and RFM analysis to segment VIPs, recover abandoned carts, and reward loyal shoppers, ensuring repeat purchases and long-term relationships. A Central Hub for PrestaShop Data Unify customer, product, channel and campaign data in one powerful platform. Connectif gives PrestaShop merchants a 360º view of their store performance, enabling smarter decision-making and optimized marketing automation strategies for accelerated growth. Omnichannel Communication Tailored for PrestaShop Stores Engage customers across web, app, email, SMS, push notifications, WhatsApp, and social ads—all seamlessly aligned with your PrestaShop store. Create consistent, branded experiences that deliver meaningful communications in the right place and at the right time.

You receive your money – guaranteed. Real time saving – Santander is responsible for the collection process and thereby reduces your administrative effort. Individual settlement – you receive monthly transaction overviews, adapted to your individual needs Conversion increase – you benefit from the popularity of the product Purchase on Account, the preferred payment method for many customers. Improved liquidity for you – With Purchase on Account and Instalment Purchase you receive your payments each working day without having to wait for the value date. With Direct Transfer the customer instantly transfers the purchase amount to your account. Improved liquidity for your customers – you allow more customers to finance expensive goods with the help of variable instalments and flexile durations. Increased customer loyalty – your customers appreciate the uncomplicated handling and the respectful communication at eye level. Flexible payment – Purchase on Account allows your customer to pay payment terms of up to 30 days. Instalment Purchase offers variable instalments and flexible durations ranging from 3 to 26 months. Direct Transfer allows customers to pay the purchase amount via bank transfer without leaving the shop check-out.

module.name: izettleconnector
module.description: This module enables you to export your PrestaShop products to the Zettle product library in 3 easy steps
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: This module enables you to export your PrestaShop products to the Zettle product library in 3 easy steps.
module.additional_description: Create an Zettle product library in secondsThis module enables you to export your PrestaShop products to the Zettle product library in 3 easy steps. It synchronizes your product stock quantity and product prices continuously. So your product stock is kept up to date no matter if you are selling a product via Zettle on the point of sale or in your online shop. Easy product exportYou can either export your complete PrestaShop product library to Zettle or choose a specific category. Also, you can export single products to Zettle. During the export configuration you can choose if price and stock quantity are part of the export or if you just want to export the products to create the Zettle product library. Automatic synchronizationEverytime an item is sold in your store or online, the product data gets synchronized between PrestaShop and Zettle. The module is providing full control how the synchronization is performed. Automatically, manually or by setting up a cronjob.If you are using the manual sync, you will get a full overview of the product data changes before you perform the update. If an error occurs during synchronization, you will receive a push email notification. Import Zettle orders to PrestaShopOrders that have been completed on Zettle will be imported to PrestaShop automatically. This module enables you to have all orders in one place. Synchronization historyYou can review all completed product export and product synchronization events. SecurityThe communication between Zettle and PrestaShop is based on the Zettle API. Any critical credentials are encrypted using the latest industry standard.  The services include: Zettle, a member of the PayPal family, is on a mission to help small businesses succeed in a world of giants – enabling people like you to accept in-person cash, cards, contactless and mobile payments. It also helps you to easily organise your products, track stock levels and monitor sales. The Zettle Reader:The Zettle reader 2 is super-fast and processes in-person contactless payments from credit cards, debit cards and American Express, as well as payments via Apple, Samsung and Google Pay. The Zettle Go app:The point-of-sale for any business. Seamlessly integrated with the Zettle Reader, it let’s you run your business – on the go or over the counter. Your shopfront and back office – all in one easy-to-use system.

The PS EventBus module enables the synchronisation of technical and non-personal data between your shop and these other modules installed on your shop. module.additional_description: With the Soisy Buy Now Pay Later solution, you increase the average amount of your carts, your conversions and sales because your customers can divide the cart amount into the number of installments that suits them most, from 3 installments upwards; these “smaller” payments increase their purchasing power and stimulate shopping cart One installment payment, many advantages 1. Increase conversions+ 250% with the interest-free loan: zero interests and no commissions for your customers 2. Spend lesswith the loan with interests solution: less costs for you, and interests paid by your customers 3. Get the money immediately: once the loan is approved, we will transfer the amount to your Soisy payment account within the following 24 hours 4. No credit risk for you if the customer does not pay the installments 5. Think about selling, we offer you dedicated support: sales and technical team at your disposal before, during and after the go-live + Soisy internal customer support team available to your customers via email and chat for any questions about the Soisy Buy Now Pay Later Soution, so you can focus on your work. 6. Offer a flexible solution to your customers, available both for credit/debit card and bank account “In the most important period of the year for us, with the Soisy interest-free loan and installment payment we increased sales by + 255% compared to the previous year. We are a fast growing company: this year we joined the ranking drawn up by Sole 24 Ore of the 450 leading growth companies in Italy out of over 5,000 candidate companies and we entered the Financial Times ranking of the 1000 companies with growth faster in Europe: it is also thanks to Soisy that we have been able to achieve this goal, increasing our sales, halving abandoned carts and significantly contributing to increasing oursales"- Daniel Giacomello, e-commerce manager StufeaPelletItalia.it Technogym, Stufe a Pellet Italia, Grohe, Diadora Fitness, Emma Materasso, Agrieuro, Raptus & Rose ... and other +1000 e-commerce companies have already chosen us to make their customers pay in +3 installments; and you, what are you waiting for?

module.additional_description: Import & Update your product catalog smart and easily Let this service free you from manually managing your product catalog. File Formats Features CSV & Excel FormatsYou can use Excel formulas in your filesUpload your files directly from your PC, URL, FTP, SFTP, ZIP archiveUse your own, supplier, other store column format. For stock updating, you can have just a combination quantity and SKU or barcode in your file. Import Conditions Disabling products that are out of stockImport/Skip new productsUpdate/Skip existing productsDisable, products that already are not available in your import fileSkip not needed products from importImport/Update products just from selected categories, suppliers, brands Smart Formulas & Custom Fields You can adjust all prices during import. module.description_full: Official module for La Poste. No subscription or commitment. Synchronize your orders with La Poste Pro Expéditions and ship them with Colissimo, Chronopost or Lettre Suivie. Display a parcel point map during checkout.
module.additional_description: Save 2 hours a day Your orders are synchronized with your La Poste Pro Expéditions account, where you can automate shipping rules to generate your shipping labels. A wide range of shipping options to suit your every needs: express, parcel points, home, letters, parcels, domestic, international, with or without signature... A single invoice for all your shipments and a single customer service to manage all your queries. Technical support with actual humans that answer your messages, not robots that make you go round in circles.

module.name: bpostshippingplatform
module.description: Speed up shipping label creation with our automated solution
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Speed up shipping label creation with our automated solution
module.additional_description: Streamline your shipping process with intelligent automation. Save time using filters that automatically generate shipping labels for specific orders. Now available for both large (contract) and small (SME) plans. Benefit from a dedicated Account Manager with a large plan and enjoy competitive rates tailored to your business needs.

module.name: channable
module.description: List, advertise and optimize millions of products across channels and teams
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: List, advertise and optimize millions of products across channels and teams. With Channable, marketplace coordinators, performance marketing experts and social media managers can efficiently work together across Google, Amazon, Meta, and beyond.
module.additional_description: Fast and easy importsConnecting your PrestaShop account with Channable will allow you to import your entire product feed with just a few mouse clicks. Inventory synchronizationInventory changes in PrestaShop are automatically updated within Channable and on the export channels you are using. As soon as an item is no longer in stock, the ads for this product will be automatically removed, until the product comes back in stock. Thousands of channels to choose fromChannable offers thousands of channels to choose from for all your products. Channel-specific market insights allow you to choose the best fitting channel for your products, maximizing your sales by targeting ready-to-buy customers. Free SupportAt Channable we believe in helping our clients in every step of the way. Our dedicated support team is here to assist you with all problems and concerns 5 days a week.
